Description: On I-64 at mile marker 260.9 in the City of Hampton, near Big Bethel Road, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-77 at mile marker 52.6 in the County of Bland, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north left shoulder and left lane are closed. The south left shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 57 in the County of Rockbridge, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
